definition: fruit (especially peach) whose flesh adheres strongly to the pit, to hold on tightly or tenaciously
details:
noun
- fruit (especially peach) whose flesh adheres strongly to the pit
= synonyms: clingstone
verb
- to hold on tightly or tenaciously
= synonyms: hang
- to come or be in close contact with
= example: to come or be in close contact with
= synonyms: cleave, cohere, stick
- to remain emotionally or intellectually attached
= example: to remain emotionally or intellectually attached
